channel.title: I need a simple script
channel.description:
I need a script that will click the box in this video:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lxgIPuZ7U8M
And then click the "ok" in a dialog box if it pops up.
Thanks if someone can.

item.title: I need a simple script
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

It works for me, the version I posted earlier was compatible with WinXp. I use Win7 at home, so this is the script I used in the vid.

[code= pascal]//Jirachi’s Park Script
//by Echo_
program JirachiTrainer;

var
x,y: Integer;
SearchBmp: Integer;
ContinueBmp: Integer;
ProceedBmp: Integer;
OkBmp: Integer;

procedure LoadSearch;
begin
SearchBmp := BitmapFromString(51, 20, ‘meJztlsENwyAMRZnLA3mZXJiGZR’ +
‘iG/vRLjmVKVNpDOGChSDi2/7MhUo6UjlVXW8822KxtsFl7BCzXlpI’ +
‘UvdMdgWlB7mWt6ApgpLJEQaGVwLLAX3s/jWVLg0fNWbOYbtbzwSJo’ +
‘zScyQAQ7+Sg0AkMQalopPQMKqShNIT9GpkCm1Uxd5sKlpfr5X+RvH’ +
‘rxm1jdgPSHK+q5tPqEFD+ZvQujCB0yBoRQnY8eHbbh4QbSfmEX2if’ +
‘+Ahcl4Cf+p+lMbTSwUtDv2A9gKtsFmbYPN2uM/zzfrBcR1Qe8=’);
end;

procedure LoadContinue;
begin
ContinueBmp := BitmapFromString(62, 20, ‘meJztl1EOwyAIhjkXB+IyffE0Xs’ +
‘bDMBwbMRaNWzcXF/+0L4g/X5E26QFwLHvxgtrk87XJ5+v/yCMzAMF’ +
‘TKeC4Z5K9GCjbig1jSK86jMglV2wrTZGvkH9JLnmrSxovTyEkeUZE’ +
‘lEC+A4pVAoqWJhGKDzc3WYORMoOkyoLE+N4uM9HVcXKOVAbVSoEtQ’ +
‘esasNatem4b3WSX3K31ds9Lhwqmqtsnr5LdYHm4rRdtfM47Pf84uW’ +
‘5xh6RPzo1vS2vOz1Nqmec5dx/TbN05H5+WJbTJ52uTz9fPf8euXDd’ +
‘NFUzT’);
end;

procedure LoadProceed;
begin
ProceedBmp := BitmapFromString(59, 20, ‘meJztl9ENwyAMRJmLgVgmP57Gy3’ +
‘gY6uYqy4KGRiDSROLER3SA83L2T7YQtqet/Bwt4NlawLN1W+CQOCq’ +
‘YUOF/BRY9Hyk4CcWrSD/qAE5vn3FXmTOni1h3jQAnzgiZRB/2jUgU’ +
‘dVfUqrvgTU7BKnjnyEQ40EjCuAtgVFPgxGKcgNQuAMMA/PfWxxrm4’ +
‘AxjHgBsMPYiT+XNOnDrRcPE3ZGRMBXAjZTqhL1zZKJId8I/gYv0Ts’ +
‘5w0RRvFp09D3xnLeDZWsCz9fefnY71As+tvYM=’);
end;

procedure LoadOk;
begin
OkBmp := BitmapFromString(74, 24, ‘meJzd2L9u2lAYBfDvlWzpbmmSdq’ +
‘BZq0oxLIaVPkIsq4thilpV6kRN1NGwdSvFQlXbBUog/0osW36AyLZ’ +
‘saDukWXrIDVc8wLUi3aML+jiyuPxkkGWKorgaffzy9vDT6x1lFjhA’ +
‘FUVx6Z98e7+3/Fm5Cw6UWeAABdrgzcvltNJsNlerlTLPt/EroEDDe’ +
‘by7PuC9MgEHKP4txbBULts6YAuFsn3u/i2e58oFKKEDtowtGv2cNp’ +
‘m1GS/7ec6okc/amGd5Tqzdb5DcfcHZ1mUlpN7LGFE2bWGeZhmx1rT’ +
‘FMPcy9HXeU73HS+kRutvF+oqQSs0kTYk5qWeKxpmkJrE09bw0ZWSm’ +
‘E4c5E88kufvyrC8Ki8qD7lclkR1nnMCSJJ5oxknCmJOMHVTQmY7jM’ +
‘LqvSwlQXPf3/BmwsdTYo9jW9TgeiQYT6XbcrXUxUA2/RMxyNxUBBy’ +
‘ihk/7+0NUIuq5ooNOhG9modKrZXVvHASNb+tY8Qvfn7CmwkdT4UUS’ +
‘aFblV0Vh+VCUtilw3ijSqRr5VddEQGrlbI+AAJXRhCTHc0CAKQze8’ +
‘fxAZQ0vjs0ZGOLQwaxY6HDOUvrvQ/T7bBzYoIUYnENe7oGPwshME0’ +
‘AWDI/6SjM6RRkEwkLgvOEA96Ob7C+UClNAB+9gfR2bW526jW832rp’ +
‘QLUEIH7IVCWd+ubnTL091z5QIUaLg9v/m+C+x8PlfmGQEKtEv/5Ou’ +
‘7nZsfT4pTdRY4QIGGO9mL4YfPxy8e/W86iQscoED7Dw1qGAc=’);
end;

procedure ClickSearch;
begin
if(FindBitmap(SearchBmp,x,y)) then
begin
MoveMouse(x+5,y+12);
Wait(100);
ClickMouse(x+5,y+12,mouse_Left);
Writeln(‘Found “Search”’);
Wait(300);
end;
end;

procedure ClickContinue;
begin
if(FindBitmap(ContinueBmp,x,y)) then
begin
MoveMouse(x+5,y+12);
Wait(100);
ClickMouse(x+5,y+12,mouse_Left);
Writeln(‘Found “Continue”’)
Wait(300);
end;
end;

procedure ClickProceed;
begin
if(FindBitmap(ProceedBmp,x,y)) then
begin
MoveMouse(x+5,y+12);
Wait(100);
ClickMouse(x+5,y+12,mouse_Left);
Writeln(‘Found “Proceed”’)
Wait(300);
end;
end;

procedure ClickOk;
begin
if(FindBitmap(OkBmp,x,y)) then
begin
MoveMouse(x,y);
Wait(100);
ClickMouse(x,y,mouse_Left);
Writeln(‘Found “Ok”’)
Wait(300);
end;
end;

procedure FreeBmps;
begin
FreeBitmap(SearchBmp);
FreeBitmap(OkBmp);
FreeBitmap(ContinueBmp);
FreeBitmap(ProceedBmp);
end;

begin
repeat
LoadSearch;
LoadContinue;
LoadProceed;
LoadOk;
ClickSearch;
ClickContinue;
ClickProceed;
ClickOk;
FreeBmps;
until(false);
end.[/code]

item.title: I need a simple script
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

n10si t:

This is gonna sound really stupid, but how do I get the script to run? Like i click run and it does nothing…

Like I said before, your screen resolution changes the icons you have to click, so the sizes of the bitmaps I used in the script would be off. If the script can’ t find the bitmaps, it won’ t click anything. You can customize the script to work with your computer specifically, but it will be a little bit of work. I will run you through it step by step.

Take a screenshot of each button and paste it into MS paint. Crop it so that only the button and its colored outline are showing, then save it as a bitmap. After that you go into Tools- Bitmap Conversion. Click “open” and find the bitmaps of the buttons that you made and select one. Then click “to string” and a code will print out in the prompt. That is the code for the bitmap image. Copy and paste that code into the load procedures, making sure that you change each name to the name of the specific image (ex. “Bmp” to “SearchBmp” etc.) Do that for all four buttons, save and compile, and the script should work fine.

Read full topic

item.title: I need a simple script
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

Alright here it is. The only issue I had was with the screen resolution, you might have to tweak the bitmaps depending on your screen. I will upload a video when I have the time, but for now, here’ s the script. Enjoy ;D

[code= pascal]//Jirachi’s Park Script
//by Echo_
program JirachiTrainer;

var
x,y: Integer;
SearchBmp: Integer;
ContinueBmp: Integer;
ProceedBmp: Integer;
OkBmp: Integer;

procedure LoadSearch;
begin
SearchBmp := BitmapFromString(51, 20, ‘meJztltENwyAMRBnPA3mLrMAujM’ +
‘Io9NKTHMuUqLQf4QMLRcKxfc+GSDlSOlZdbT3bYLO2wWbtEbBcW0p’ +
‘S9E53BKYFuZe1oiuAkcoSBYVWAssCf+39NJYtDR41Z81iulnPB4ug’ +
‘NZ/IABHs5KPQCAxBqGml9AwopKI0hfwYmQKZVjN1mQuXlurnf5G/e’ +
‘fCaWd+A9YQo67u2+YQWPJi/CaELHzAFhlKcjB0ftuHiBdF+YhbZJ/’ +
‘4DFibjJfyn6k9tNLFQ0O7YD2Ar2AabtQ02a4//PN+sFwLGS1A=’);
end;

procedure LoadContinue;
begin
ContinueBmp := BitmapFromString(62, 20, ‘meJztl2EOwyAIhT0eB+IWvYJ34S’ +
‘gehdGyEWfRuHVzcfGl/YP4+Iq0SbcQtmkvnlCLfLwW+Xj9Hzkxh4D’ +
‘hoRSh3zPJXoi424oNQ0yvOvTIJacD20oj8RXyL8klr3VJ4/kpxCTP’ +
‘CAAS2O8IYpUCkqVJBOnu5iZrkHBnkFRZkBgf7TITXe0nZ8I8qFYKb’ +
‘Ala14C1bnruuW10k11yt9bbPc8dCpiibpu8SHaD+eHWXrT+OW/0/O’ +
‘PkusUdkjY5V74ttTk/T6llnufcfUyzdee8f1qm0CIfr0U+Xj//Hbt’ +
‘y3QC4/Vpj’);
end;

procedure LoadProceed;
begin
ProceedBmp := BitmapFromString(59, 20, ‘meJztl9ENwyAMRBmPgbxFVmAXj+’ +
‘JRqNtrLQcaGgWRJhInPqIDnJezf7KEsNxt5ftoAo/WBB6tywIH4qh’ +
‘gkgr/K7Do+ZiCk6R4EuhHB4Dp6TPuKnNmOoX0rR5g4oyQk+jDayOm’ +
‘FHVX1Kq74E2mYBW8s2UiHKgnYdwFMKopMLEYJyC1C8AwAP+99bGG2’ +
‘TnDmAcAG4y9yFN5sw7cetEwcbdnJEwFcCOlOmHvbJkocjjhn8BFej’ +
‘tnuGiKN2Xd2f3AV9YEHq0JPFp//9k5sB5QushG’);
end;

procedure LoadOk;
begin
OkBmp := BitmapFromString(74, 24, ‘meJzd2L9u2lAYBfDvlWzpbmmSdq’ +
‘BZq0oxLIaVPkIsq4thilpV6kRN1NGwdSvFQlXbBUog/0osW36AyLZ’ +
‘saDukWXrIDVc8wLUi3aML+jiyuPxkkGWKorgaffzy9vDT6x1lFjhA’ +
‘FUVx6Z98e7+3/Fm5Cw6UWeAABdrgzcvltNJsNlerlTLPt/EroEDDe’ +
‘by7PuC9MgEHKP4txbBULts6YAuFsn3u/i2e58oFKKEDtowtGv2cNp’ +
‘m1GS/7ec6okc/amGd5Tqzdb5DcfcHZ1mUlpN7LGFE2bWGeZhmx1rT’ +
‘FMPcy9HXeU73HS+kRutvF+oqQSs0kTYk5qWeKxpmkJrE09bw0ZWSm’ +
‘E4c5E88kufvyrC8Ki8qD7lclkR1nnMCSJJ5oxknCmJOMHVTQmY7jM’ +
‘LqvSwlQXPf3/BmwsdTYo9jW9TgeiQYT6XbcrXUxUA2/RMxyNxUBBy’ +
‘ihk/7+0NUIuq5ooNOhG9modKrZXVvHASNb+tY8Qvfn7CmwkdT4UUS’ +
‘aFblV0Vh+VCUtilw3ijSqRr5VddEQGrlbI+AAJXRhCTHc0CAKQze8’ +
‘fxAZQ0vjs0ZGOLQwaxY6HDOUvrvQ/T7bBzYoIUYnENe7oGPwshME0’ +
‘AWDI/6SjM6RRkEwkLgvOEA96Ob7C+UClNAB+9gfR2bW526jW832rp’ +
‘QLUEIH7IVCWd+ubnTL091z5QIUaLg9v/m+C+x8PlfmGQEKtEv/5Ou’ +
‘7nZsfT4pTdRY4QIGGO9mL4YfPxy8e/W86iQscoED7Dw1qGAc=’);
end;

procedure ClickSearch;
begin
if(FindBitmap(SearchBmp,x,y)) then
begin
MoveMouse(x+5,y+12);
Wait(100);
ClickMouse(x+5,y+12,mouse_Left);
Writeln(‘Found “Search”’);
Wait(300);
end;
end;

procedure ClickContinue;
begin
if(FindBitmap(ContinueBmp,x,y)) then
begin
MoveMouse(x+5,y+12);
Wait(100);
ClickMouse(x+5,y+12,mouse_Left);
Writeln(‘Found “Continue”’)
Wait(300);
end;
end;

procedure ClickProceed;
begin
if(FindBitmap(ProceedBmp,x,y)) then
begin
MoveMouse(x+5,y+12);
Wait(100);
ClickMouse(x+5,y+12,mouse_Left);
Writeln(‘Found “Proceed”’)
Wait(300);
end;
end;

procedure ClickOk;
begin
if(FindBitmap(OkBmp,x,y)) then
begin
MoveMouse(x,y);
Wait(100);
ClickMouse(x,y,mouse_Left);
Writeln(‘Found “Ok”’)
Wait(300);
end;
end;

procedure FreeBmps;
begin
FreeBitmap(SearchBmp);
FreeBitmap(OkBmp);
FreeBitmap(ContinueBmp);
FreeBitmap(ProceedBmp);
end;

begin
repeat
LoadSearch;
LoadContinue;
LoadProceed;
LoadOk;
ClickSearch;
ClickContinue;
ClickProceed;
ClickOk;
FreeBmps;
until(false);
end.[/code]

item.title: I need a simple script
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

Echo_:

I need the website url in order to start working on the script.

Tpmrpg.net

You’ll have to make an account to get there, and then click over on the side “Jirachi’s Park” pretty much the same as in the video, so you can use it.
